Header: SF Reveals about MR's Underground Bunker
Content: Field Marshall Sarath Fonseka says that he did not know that that there was an underground bunker at the President House or that Security Council meetings had been held inside the said bunker. However former president Mahinda Rajapaksa participating at a function held day-before-yesterday at Hakmana in Matara said that this bunker had been constructed for security during the time Terrorist threat prevailed in the country.
